entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with thunderstorms possible, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, with thunderstorms possible. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Freezing level about 2400 metres. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary:
Showers may fall as snow about the summit Friday evening through to early Saturday morning, although little, if any, snow is expected to accumulate on the road.
Note: Brief snow showers may affect the same area again during Saturday morning.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary:
Brief showers may fall as snow about the eastern tunnel entrance late Friday afternoon and evening, although little, if any, snow is expected to accumulate on the road.
Note: Brief snow showers may affect the same area again during Saturday morning.
